An FBI agent assembles a team of experts to discover how the baffling robberies are committed and what the secret agenda behind the crime spree is. Crime thriller, starring Jesse Eisenberg, Mark Ruffalo, Woody Harrelson and Isla Fisher.(n)

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: A lonely boy makes a wish at Christmas that his teddy bear will come to life, which is magically granted. The boy grows up to become a directionless slacker, with the foul-mouthed living toy still his inseparable friend - but his girlfriend thinks it is time for him to grow up. Comedy, starring Mark Wahlberg and Mila Kunis, directed by and featuring the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: The Raid
programme.desc: A cop joins a Swat team as they undertake a deadly mission - to infiltrate the tenement that contains the lair of a powerful drug kingpin. However, they soon learn they have walked into a trap - all routes out of the building are blocked, the gangster's henchmen are surrounding them and they will have to fight their way out. Action thriller, starring Iko Uwais and Joe Taslim. In Indonesian.(n)

programme.title: Silent Running
programme.desc: A scientist, with the help of his three robot assistants, tends a huge garden aboard a space station, created to replenish an Earth ravaged by nuclear warfare. But his superiors' decision to abandon the project prompts him to embark on a desperate course of action. Ecological sci-fi drama, starring Bruce Dern, with Cliff Potts and Ron Rifkin.(n)

programme.title: Spy Interview Special
programme.desc: Melissa McCarthy, Miranda Hart and Jude Law, and Bridesmaids director Paul Feig talk about their new action-comedy Spy, and the art of making funny movies.(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: A secret agent decides to retire after having a baby, while her two stepchildren remain completely unaware of her exciting past. They stumble on to the truth when she is recalled to duty and, with the aid of two former junior spies, they help battle an evil mastermind who has the power to control time. Family adventure, starring Jessica Alba, Jeremy Piven, Rowan Blanchard and Mason Cook.(n)

programme.title: Carry On Spying
programme.desc: A secret formula is stolen by a sinister organisation masterminded by the evil Dr Crow. The British government plans to assign its top agents to deal with the crisis, but owing to staff shortages, has to settle for a bungling spy and his three hapless trainees. Comedy, starring Kenneth Williams, Charles Hawtrey, Barbara Windsor, Bernard Cribbins, Jim Dale, Eric Barker and Victor Maddern.(n)

Fantasy adventure, starring Alexander Ludwig, Christopher Eccleston and Ian McShane.(n)

The two fall in love and a shared passion for books leads them on a literary pilgrimage to Amsterdam in search of reclusive author Peter van Houten. Romantic drama based on the bestselling novel by John Green, starring Shailene Woodley, Ansel Elgort, Laura Dern and Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: The foul-mouthed talking teddy bear is horrified to discover that he counts as property according to the law. He and his human best friend hire a pot-smoking lawyer to help them fight a court case and get Ted legally recognised as a person. Comedy sequel, starring Mark Wahlberg and Amanda Seyfried, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

Thriller, starring Malcolm McDowell and Paul Bettany as the nameless central character in the two different eras. With David Thewlis, Saffron Burrows and Kenneth Cranham.(n)

Horror, with Bailee Madison, Guy Pearce and Katie Holmes.(n)

Animated adventure, with the voices of Kodi Smit-McPhee and John Goodman.(n)

Family comedy, starring Jason Alexander, Rupert Everett, Faye Dunaway, Eric Lloyd and Paul Reubens.(n)

programme.desc: The story of the destruction of the major dams in Germany's industrial heartland in the Ruhr valley in 1943, a mission that seemed impossible until engineer and scientist Barnes Wallis came up with the ingenious idea of bouncing bombs, and the pilots of 617 Squadron were trained to fly the crucial mission. Second World War drama, with Michael Redgrave, Richard Todd, Basil Sydney, Derek Farr and Ursula Jeans.(n)

programme.desc: Premiere. A teenager enjoys a night of adventures with a mysterious girl, whom he has been fascinated with since childhood. The next day she disappears without trace, but he discovers she has left him a series of clues, which he and his friends follow in the hope of finding her. Romantic mystery based on the novel by John Green, starring Nat Wolff and Cara Delevingne.(n)

Action comedy, starring Sandra Bullock and Melissa McCarthy.(n)

Comedy, with Jason Bateman, Mila Kunis, Kristen Wiig and Ben Affleck.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle develops a potentially fatal infection and learns his arm may have to be amputated, while Syd discovers a seemingly perfect new doctor is actually hiding a disturbing secret. Melina Kanakaredes stars.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan comes to the aid of a small town doctor whose health is failing, but who refuses to retire as his neighbours depend on him and there is nobody to take his place.(n)

programme.desc: An ambitious district attorney remonstrates a lawyer over his drinking problem, but agrees to help a man accused of stealing a bottle of wine.(n)

programme.desc: An ambitious district attorney remonstrates a lawyer over his drinking problem, but agrees to help a man accused of stealing a bottle of wine.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: End of Summer
programme.desc: A Victorian artist struggles to repress her romantic feelings for a wealthy suitor, who responds by embarking on a torrid fling with her 18-year-old ward instead. Drama, starring Jacqueline Bisset, Peter Weller, Julian Sands and Amy Locane.(n)

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes.(n)

programme.title: The Thorn Birds
programme.desc: A priest harbours a secret desire for a woman that proves to be stronger than his love for the Church. Romantic drama based on Colleen McCullough's novel, with Richard Chamberlain.(n)

programme.title: Little Black Book
programme.desc: A naive researcher for a TV talk show becomes increasingly insecure about her boyfriend's past, and sneaks a look at his personal organiser for clues. She decides to meet a few of his ex-girlfriends and interview them, pretending it is for a forthcoming episode, but ends up befriending one of the women. Romantic comedy, starring Brittany Murphy, Holly Hunter, Kathy Bates and Ron Livingston.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura unwittingly befriends Walnut Grove's new banker while out fishing, and is stunned when he suggests she is only being kind to him so he will give her father a loan.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A talented player leaves the townsfolk convinced they will win an annual baseball game, but when they start betting on the event, his disapproving wife forbids him from taking part.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Sydney discovers Kyle's therapist has taken a special interest in him and Joanie has serious doubts about her father's pulling power as a cable TV presenter.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle decides he needs to get away from family and friends, whose over-solicitous behaviour is delaying his recovery, while Jim is upset at being dropped from his TV show.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason tries to reform Cousin Boone after he gets in trouble with the law again, and John-Boy's ex-fiancee visits Walton's Mountain.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen takes drugs to cope with the stress of her exams, and Sissy leaves her husband.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth dreads the prospect of her 13th birthday, Jason enjoys his new job as a radio presenter, and supernatural forces seem to be at work in the family home.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin is attracted to a troubled artist, who asks to paint her picture. Grandma buys a canary, but finds it refuses to sing.(n)

programme.title: The Queen's Coronation: Behind Palace Doors
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the conflict between the Queen Mother and Prince Philip over how to administer Princess Elizabeth's coronation in 1953. While the public was presented with an image of the Windsors as a firmly united family, the pair clashed over Philip's desire to introduce the population to a monarchy ready to adapt to modern times. This programme charts the Queen Mother's efforts to protect the royal reputation she helped rebuild after the abdication of Edward VIII.(n)

programme.title: Prince Harry at 30
programme.desc: Documentary profiling Prince Harry's life via the tabloids, charting his rise from troubled teen through to frontline soldier, and the world's most eligible bachelor.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Although many in Walnut Grove think he's a crazy man in a haunted house, brave Laura befriends mysterious hermit Amos Pike and soon discovers the truth behind the rumours.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and Grace are frustrated that the boys they want to take them to the spring dance are showing no interest, so decide to make them jealous.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd arrives home for the Christmas holidays, and begins to reflect on whether her return to Providence means anything - until a dream about what the town would be like without her convinces her she has made a difference.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd is wooed by a handsome 19-year-old Russian prodigy whose grandmother has kept him hidden in an attic since childhood, while Joanie searches for the amorous mystery man dressed as Zorro who kissed her passionately at a costume party before disappearing into the night.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob offers to teach Elizabeth to drive, but she has little talent for it. Corabeth's secret drinking is getting out of hand, and threatens her career.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Verdie Foster's daughter returns home after graduating from college, and is angry to find that racial prejudice stands in the way of her getting a job. Erin seeks a job locally.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth is not happy when Grandma is visited by an old flame, while Jim-Bob persuades Yancy to use his talents to make fuel instead of moonshine.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The townsfolk are stunned by news of the attack on Pearl Harbour, while Mary Ellen receives word that her husband has been killed.(n)

programme.title: Remembering Diana, Princess of Wales

programme.title: Prince Harry: The Mysterious Prince
programme.desc: Profile of the prince, focusing on his life before he joined the Army.(n)

programme.title: Harry & Meghan: A Very Modern Romance
programme.desc: The story of Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's relationship, examining whether their marriage will radically change the British monarchy.(n)

programme.title: William & Kate: A First Anniversary Celebration
programme.desc: An exclusive documentary that goes behind-the-scenes of WIlliam and Kate's first year together as husband and wife.(n)

programme.title: I, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Daniel Blake (Dave Johns) is a man out of time. He's a widowed woodworker who's never owned a computer and lives according to his own common sense moral code. After a heart attack leaves him unable to work and the state welfare system fails him, Daniel must stand up and fight for his dignity and lead a one-man crusade for compassion that transforms the lives of a single mother (Hayley Squires) and her two children.(n)

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.(n)

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye
programme.desc: Set amidst the colorful backdrop of mid-20th century New York City, this film follows a young J.D. Salinger (Nicholas Hoult) as he struggles to find his voice, pursues a love affair with famed socialite Oona O'Neill (Zoey Deutch) and fights on the frontlines of World War II. It's these experiences that inform the creation of his masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, bringing him overnight fame (and notoriety) and leading him to withdraw from the public eye for the rest of his life.(n)

programme.title: Bad News
programme.desc: In the grip of his addictions, Patrick Melrose must fly to New York to collect his father’s ashes. Over the course of a lost Manhattan weekend, Patrick’s remorseless search for satisfaction, haunted by old acquaintances and insistent inner voices, sends him into a nightmarish spiral, including a disastrous date with the girl of his dreams. Alone in his hotel room later that night, he pushes body and mind to the very edge – desperate to stay one step ahead of his rapidly encroaching past. Limited series premiere.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: War and Peace
programme.desc: The gloves are off as Donald Trump fights a 360-degree battle to keep the presidency. He's taking shots at those who stand to threaten it, and is at war against the "deep state" of the FBI, CIA, and the Department of Justice. Stories covered include Michael Cohen's connection to a Russian oligarch, Trump's attempts to undermine the Mueller investigation, the scuttling of the Iran deal, and the Senate confirmation hearing for Trump's controversial CIA Director pick, Gina Haspel.(n)

programme.title: All the Wilburys
programme.desc: Axe tries for a fresh start at Axe Capital. Chuck asserts his political autonomy—and wrestles with whether to honor his word to a friend. Taylor asks for more independence at Axe Capital. Lara and Axe negotiate a new arrangement regarding Lara's money. Connerty adjusts to an uncomfortable situation.(n)

programme.title: Plus One
programme.desc: Goldie contends with her daughter Amanda's vow of silence and her 'spiritual mentor' Howard. Adam tags along with Ron to Soul Train and meets the show's producer. An anxious Cassie travels home to Texas for a wedding, where she faces some difficult choices from her past. Nick, Bill and Ralph show up at the wedding as well. Eddie capitalizes on a career opportunity with his idol.(n)

programme.title: Kirk Fox: That Guy
programme.desc: In this stand-up comedy special, Kirk Fox examines that guy we all wonder about who sits at the bar by himself. He covers what makes that guy tick, his frequent social faux pas and his misunderstandings with women.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.(n)

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: When a fuel leak threatens to strand three astronauts in space, the ground crew and the mission team must struggle to avert catastrophe. The team's solutions are ingenious, led by Academy Award winner Tom Hanks. Directed by Academy Award winner Ron Howard, this is the gripping true story of the 1970's ill-fated moon voyage.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.(n)

programme.title: Plus One
programme.desc: Goldie contends with her daughter Amanda's vow of silence and her 'spiritual mentor' Howard. Adam tags along with Ron to Soul Train and meets the show's producer. programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.(n)

programme.title: Never Mind
programme.desc: At the Melrose family’s glorious house in the South of France, young Patrick has the run of the magical grounds. His father David rules with cruelty and his mother Eleanor has retreated into self medication and booze. Bravely imaginative and self-sufficient out of necessity, 9-year-old Patrick encounters the volatile lives of adults with fear. They are expecting guests for the weekend, but this afternoon is profoundly unlike other summer days, and the shocking events that precede the guests’ arrival tear Patrick's world in two.(n)

programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)

programme.title: Death Becomes Her
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winning director Robert Zemeckis creates an adventure about two women, Academy Award®-winners Meryl Streep and Goldie Hawn, determined to win the heart of the same man, Bruce Willis. When they both drink an immortality potion, their mutual murder plans get a little complicated.(n)

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: On distant planets, a royal messiah has been born who will restore order to the universe, but there are forces that don't want evil to be vanquished!(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.(n)

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent.(n)

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as the vampire Maximillian, the most undead dude in the 'hood. He also plays a paunchy preacher and a fast talking thug. Angela Basset plays the cop whose world is rocked by Maximillian's attempts to make her his mate for eternity. Kadeem Hardison plays the haplessly decaying vampire's sidekick who is forever losing things. Directed by Wes Craven.(n)

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.(n)

programme.title: Attack of the Killer Donuts
programme.desc: A chemical accident turns ordinary donuts into bloodthirsty monsters and three friends must track them down as they begin eating their victims. It's up to them to destroy the donuts and save their sleepy little town.(n)

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.(n)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.(n)

programme.title: The Lair of the White Worm
programme.desc: Archaeologist Angus Flint is staying at Mercy Farm, in the heart of England's Peak district. He is the guest of Mary and Eve Trent, two sisters who were orphaned when their parents mysteriously vanished. While excavating their garden for a paper he is writing, he unearths a prehistoric skull of indeterminate age and species, and unleashes an unspeakable evil on the countryside. When the skull is stolen by nearby resident Lady Sylvia Marsh, all of their lives are caught in a threatening web of pagan terror, savage rituals and crawling horror.(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.(n)

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.(n)

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.(n)

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening.(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As The Chosen One, Eddie Murphy is on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who's been abducted by an evil cult. He battles a band of henchmen, scrambles through a booby-trapped chamber of horrors and traverses Tibet to obtain a sacred dagger. But it's his wit that turns out to be his sharpest weapon.(n)

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening.(n)

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis.(n)

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems.(n)

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.(n)

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.(n)

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis.(n)

programme.title: Wristcutters: A Love Story (2006)
programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As The Chosen One, Eddie Murphy is on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who's been abducted by an evil cult. He battles a band of henchmen, scrambles through a booby-trapped chamber of horrors and traverses Tibet to obtain a sacred dagger. But it's his wit that turns out to be his sharpest weapon.(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.(n)

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.(n)

programme.title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
programme.desc: Doctor Parnassus (Christopher Plummer) is cursed with a dark secret. Thousands of years ago he made a bet with the devil, Mr. Nick (Tom Waits), in which he won immortality. Centuries later, on meeting his one true love, Dr. Parnassus made another deal with the devil, trading his immortality for youth, on condition that when his daughter reaches her 16th birthday, she will become the property of Mr. Nick. His daughter is now rapidly approaching the age milestone and Dr. Parnassus is desperate to protect her from her impending fate.(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship.(n)

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Oz (Matthew Perry) is a miserable dentist living with Sophie (Rosanna Arquette), his shrew of a wife. Things get even worse when hitman Jimmy "The Tulip" (Bruce Willis) moves in next door. Sent by Sophie to Chicago to rat out Jimmy to the Gogalak gang, Oz meets and falls in love with Cynthia (Natasha Henstridge), Jimmy's estranged wife. Oz returns home only to discover Sophie's hired Jill (Amanda Peet), his perky dental hygienist, to kill him.(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.(n)

programme.title: Black Sabbath - The End of The End
programme.desc: Chronicles the final tour from Black Sabbath. On February 4th, 2017, Black Sabbath takes the stage in Birmingham, the city where it all began, to play the 81st and final gig of the tour and bring down the curtain on a career that spanned almost half a century. The cameras are taken into the heart of the action, getting up close and personal with the band as they perform genre-defining hits, from 'Iron Man' to 'Paranoid' to 'War Pigs', among others. The special also features a studio performance of some of their songs not played on the tour.(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed.(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar.(n)

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: As The Chosen One, Eddie Murphy is on a madcap mission to save The Golden Child, a youth with mystical powers who's been abducted by an evil cult. He battles a band of henchmen, scrambles through a booby-trapped chamber of horrors and traverses Tibet to obtain a sacred dagger. But it's his wit that turns out to be his sharpest weapon.(n)

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Oz (Matthew Perry) is a miserable dentist living with Sophie (Rosanna Arquette), his shrew of a wife. Things get even worse when hitman Jimmy "The Tulip" (Bruce Willis) moves in next door. Sent by Sophie to Chicago to rat out Jimmy to the Gogalak gang, Oz meets and falls in love with Cynthia (Natasha Henstridge), Jimmy's estranged wife. Oz returns home only to discover Sophie's hired Jill (Amanda Peet), his perky dental hygienist, to kill him.(n)

programme.title: Eddie Griffin: Undeniable
programme.desc: This comedy special is Griffin's magnum opus about the world, relationships and humanity as a whole. He celebrates his 30-year anniversary in comedy by being on stage and pulling laughter from his fans during the live taping.(n)

programme.title: Dude Bro Party Massacre III
programme.desc: Brent enters the halls of the Delta Bi Theta fraternity. He isn't just any pledge, he's a legacy - and it's a legacy of death. Brent is actually there to solve the mystery of his identical twin brother Brock's murder, and he'll do anything to crack the case, including an attempt at the frat's most daring prank of all time. After the prank causes two commercial jets to collide over an orphanage, they're punished to a weekend at The Old Sorority House by the Lake. But they're not the only ones there, a killer named Motherface lurks nearby.(n)

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a lonely man who bumps into an old crush and subsequently becomes obsessed with her, leading him to hold her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. But she is not who she seems to be - and his reason to lock her up may not be as crazy as originally thought.(n)

programme.title: Avenge the Crows: The Legend of Loca
programme.desc: The pendulum of revenge is set in motion when an assassin named Joker is released from prison. His orders from the Reyes Ricos prison gang are to take down Loca, an ex-gang member who once ran the powerful Los Grajos crew. Now Loca makes her living pushing drugs, and maintains a watchful eye on her young cousin, Cammy, the only family she has left. Although she is cunning and street smart, Loca doesn't see Joker coming, and he attacks Cammy to lure her out of hiding.(n)

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement.(n)

programme.title: Dream House
programme.desc: Daniel Craig and Academy Award winner Rachel Weisz star as a couple that unknowingly moves into a New England home where several grisly murders were committed, only to become the killer's next target. Academy Award nominee Naomi Watts stars as a neighbor who knew the previous family - a family whose gruesome story could be horrific foreshadowing of the present family's demise. Directed by the Academy Award nominee Jim Sheridan.(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.(n)

programme.title: Eric Clapton: Life in 12 Bars
programme.desc: This documentary contextualizes Eric Clapton’s role in contemporary music and cultural history. Told through his own words, it reflects on his traumatic childhood, his difficult struggle with drugs and alcohol, the loss of his son and how he always found his inner strength and healing in music. It features extensive interviews with Clapton himself, along with his family, friends, musical collaborators, contemporaries and heroes – including late music icons B.B. King, Jimi Hendrix and George Harrison. Directed by Oscar winner Lili Fini Zanuck.(n)

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.(n)

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide.(n)

programme.title: Bleed For This
programme.desc: Boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) moves up two weight classes under the guidance of his new trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart). Pazienza takes down French boxer Gilbert Delé to become Super Middleweight Champion. Shortly after the bout however, a head-on car crash leaves him with a broken neck. Initially told he may never walk again, Pazienza chooses a risky "halo" spine-stabilization treatment, requiring him to wear a circular metal brace screwed directly into his skull for six months.(n)

programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in and directs this inspiring drama about a college professor who challenges the entrenched racism and prejudice of the 1930's by assembling and training a first-class African-American debate team, a talented group that makes its way to a national championship against Harvard University. Forest Whitaker, Jurnee Smollett and Nate Parker costar in this fact-based, critically acclaimed film.(n)

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: The 4th
programme.desc: Jamie is a down-on-his-luck illustrator who's behind on rent and tries to throw a cookout while his overbearing roommate is out of town on the 4th of July. He decides to borrow his roommate's bike for a quick trip to buy lighter fluid, but his entire day and life quickly go up in smoke. After an incident with a road-rager, Jamie finds himself far from home and trapped in a series of awkward and infuriating situations with strangers.(n)

programme.title: Nemr: No Bombing in Beirut
programme.desc: In this special filmed in both Lebanon and America, Nemr puts together an hour of uproarious comedy capturing thousands of people from the Middle East and America laughing at the same jokes, told by the same man. From his childhood in America, to his later years in Lebanon, Nemr recounts his life and touches on childhood, family, relationships, religion, war and the power of perspective.(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama.(n)

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.(n)

programme.title: Undertow (2004)
programme.desc: A backwoods teenager (Jamie Bell) and his little brother who suffers from an eating disorder must go on the run from their crazed, vengeful uncle (Josh Lucas) in this crime thriller that harkens back to the rural-set B-movies from the '70s. Shiri Appleby costars.(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey.(n)

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis.(n)

programme.title: The Flying Scotsman
programme.desc: This inspiring sports drama is the true story of Scottish bicyclist Graeme Obree, who broke the world one-hour cycling record in 1993 on a bicycle he designed and built from scrap metal and washing machine parts. Jonny Lee Miller, Laura Fraser, Brian Cox and Billy Boyd costar.(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the first manned mission to Mars, commanded by Luke Graham (Don Cheadle), lands safely on the red planet, but is soon met with catastrophe. Haunted by a cryptic last message from Graham, NASA launches the Mars Recovery Mission to investigate and bring back survivors. Confronted with nearly insurmountable dangers, but propelled by deep friendship, the team finally lands on Mars and makes a discovery that explains everything.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: Brilliant medical student Michael (Oscar Isaac) meets beautiful dance instructor Ana (Charlotte Le Bon) in late 1914. Their shared Armenian heritage sparks an attraction that turns into a romantic rivalry between Michael and Ana's boyfriend (Christian Bale), an American photojournalist. As the Ottoman Empire crumbles into war-torn chaos, their conflicting passions must be put aside as they join forces to get themselves to safety.(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.(n)

programme.title: The Promise
programme.desc: Brilliant medical student Michael (Oscar Isaac) meets beautiful dance instructor Ana (Charlotte Le Bon) in late 1914. Their shared Armenian heritage sparks an attraction that turns into a romantic rivalry between Michael and Ana's boyfriend (Christian Bale), an American photojournalist. As the Ottoman Empire crumbles into war-torn chaos, their conflicting passions must be put aside as they join forces to get themselves to safety.(n)

programme.title: Vanilla Sky
programme.desc: Tom Cruise delivers one of his finest performances in this unforgettable film that reunites him with Cameron Crowe, the director of "Jerry Maguire." The charmed life of young, handsome and wealthy publishing tycoon David Aames (Cruise) seems somehow incomplete until he meets the woman of his dreams (Penelope Cruz). But a fateful encounter with a jealous lover (Cameron Diaz) sends David's world out of control, rocketing him on a rollercoaster ride of romance, sex, suspicion and dreams...leading to a shocking, final awakening.(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
programme.desc: Fed up with crime overrunning the streets of Boston, Irish Catholic twin brothers, who are inspired by their faith, decide to cleanse their hometown of evil with their own brand of vigilante justice. As they hunt down and kill one notorious gangster after another, they become controversial folk heroes in the community, with an eccentric FBI agent on their blood-soaked trail. Stars Willem Dafoe.(n)

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Michael Douglas stars as a man who's chosen to participate in a live-action game that penetrates all aspects of his life. But when it begins to go out of control, he tries to escape. Directed by David Fincher.(n)

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn (Bruce Willis) emerges from a horrific train crash without a single scratch on him. He meets a mysterious stranger (Samuel L. Jackson) whose obsession with David will change David's life forever.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: An adventure that tells the true story of Arthur (Clive Owen) and his bond of brotherhood with Lancelot (Ioan Gruffudd) and the Knights Of The Round Table as they fight for freedom and those they love. Co-starring Keira Knightley.(n)

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In the Season 1 premiere, Henry prepares for war with France but receives cautious counsel from the powerful Cardinal Wolsey, who urges a treaty; the king learns that his queen's lady-in-waiting Elizabeth Blount is pregnant with his child.(n)

programme.title: Episode 2
programme.desc: Henry contemplates an alliance with Holy Roman Emperor Charles V of Spain despite his "Field of Cloth of Gold" ceremony celebrating allegiance to France, and executes a rival; Elizabeth gives birth to the king's illegitimate son.(n)

programme.title: Episode 3
programme.desc: A visit from Charles V forces Henry to conceal his growing disaffection from Queen Katherine, who is the influential Spanish monarch's aunt - even as Henry comes face-to-face with the seductive Anne Boleyn for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Despite being named "Defender of the Faith" by the Pope, Henry begins to scheme to replace his queen with the more desirable Anne Boleyn, as court intrigues involving Princess Margaret and plots against Cardinal Wolsey intensify.(n)

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Henry is stunned by a reversal in his alliance with Charles V and forced to look elsewhere for European support, while an insulted Anne Boleyn refuses his offer of permanent mistress status, inflaming his desire to marry her.(n)

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: An increasingly confident Henry VIII grows dissatisfied with the Catholic Church's progress with his petition for an annulment of his marriage, making Cardinal Wolsey further vulnerable to conspirators.(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: The country is struck down with food shortages and an outbreak of plague, forcing the normally buoyant Henry to doubt his future and abilities - but a sudden change in fortunes is on the horizon.(n)

programme.title: Episode 8
programme.desc: A special envoy from the Pope arrives to hear Henry's petition regarding the legitimacy of his marriage, with the fate of Cardinal Wolsey's career, the king's romance with Anne Boleyn, and the nation's relationship with Rome in the balance.(n)

programme.title: Episode 9
programme.desc: The fall from grace and power of Cardinal Wolsey is fast and merciless, with the one-time Lord Chancellor stripped of authority and influence. His replacement is an unusual choice: the morally righteous Sir Thomas More.(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Episode 10
programme.desc: In the Season One finale, a disgraced Cardinal Wolsey tries one last, desperate gambit to resurrect his career by allying himself with the similarly fallen Queen Katherine, but the king's new advisors learn of their plot.(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Violence, Nudity

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Set in the high-stakes world of the ﬁnancial industry, this film follows the key players at an investment ﬁrm during a 24-hour period in the early stages of the 2008 ﬁnancial crisis. When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.(n)

programme.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
programme.desc: Kevin Smith, the filmmaker, is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his widely reported massive heart attack in February. But before he nearly died backstage, he killed onstage discussing his marriage, his kid, his friends and his work (or lack thereof).(n)

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye
programme.desc: Set amidst the colorful backdrop of mid-20th century New York City, this film follows a young J.D. Salinger (Nicholas Hoult) as he struggles to find his voice, pursues a love affair with famed socialite Oona O'Neill (Zoey Deutch) and fights on the frontlines of World War II. It's these experiences that inform the creation of his masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, bringing him overnight fame (and notoriety) and leading him to withdraw from the public eye for the rest of his life.(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.(n)

programme.title: Kirk Fox: That Guy
programme.desc: In this stand-up comedy special, Kirk Fox examines that guy we all wonder about who sits at the bar by himself. He covers what makes that guy tick, his frequent social faux pas and his misunderstandings with women.(n)

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Set in the high-stakes world of the ﬁnancial industry, this film follows the key players at an investment ﬁrm during a 24-hour period in the early stages of the 2008 ﬁnancial crisis. When an entry-level analyst unlocks information that could prove to be the downfall of the ﬁrm, a roller-coaster ride ensues as decisions both ﬁnancial and moral catapult the lives of all involved into mayhem.(n)

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: When Las Vegas cop Vincent Downs (Jamie Foxx) and his partner Sean (Tip "T.I." Harris) rob a cocaine shipment bound for a drug-dealing casino boss (Dermot Mulroney), the desperate businessman retaliates by kidnapping Vincent's son (Octavius J. Johnson). Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar.(n)

programme.title: Patriots Day
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Boston Marathon bombing, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders (Mark Wahlberg) joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the bombers before they strike again. The stories of Special Agent Richard Deslauriers (Kevin Bacon), Police Commissioner Ed Davis (John Goodman), Sergeant Jeffrey Pugliese (J.K. Simmons) and nurse Carol Saunders (Michelle Monaghan) are all woven together to show the strength of the city.(n)

programme.title: Episode 201
programme.desc: In the Season 2 premiere, the Reformation begins as Henry breaks with the Catholic Church and declares himself head of the church; Anne's insistence leads to Henry breaking all contact with Katherine and banishing her from the court.(n)

programme.title: Episode 202
programme.desc: Henry continues undermining the Catholic Church's influence in England, while his chaplain makes a fact-finding tour of Lutheran Germany; Anne resolves to consummate her relationship with the king as Brandon plants doubts about her virtue.(n)

programme.title: Episode 203
programme.desc: His patience at an end, Henry marries Anne in secret, appoints his Lutheran chaplain Thomas Cranmer the head of the Church, and strips Queen Katherine of her title and status; the king and new queen's first child is born, a girl christened Elizabeth.(n)

programme.title: Episode 204
programme.desc: The country is asked to swear an oath recognizing the new royal succession, and Henry's supreme authority; Anne becomes pregnant again; Sir Thomas More refuses to swear to all aspects of the oath and is jailed in the Tower of London.(n)

programme.title: Episode 205
programme.desc: A miscarriage and her sister's impetuous marriage jeopardize the Boleyns' influence at court; after many failed attempts to coerce his endorsement of the king's powers, Sir Thomas More is ordered to be executed as a traitor by a reluctant Henry.(n)

programme.title: Episode 206
programme.desc: The power of Thomas Cromwell spreads as he investigates the Church for corruption, even as the Pope denounces the execution of Sir Thomas More; the queen is rebuffed by the king of France, who refuses to recognize her daughter's legitimacy.(n)

programme.title: Episode 207
programme.desc: The persecution of the Catholic Church reaches its pinnacle as Thomas Cromwell confiscates its wealth for the crown, making Henry the richest English king in history, while Katherine dies in pious poverty.(n)

programme.title: Episode 208
programme.desc: The brief resurgence of Anne at court is short-lived, as Jane Seymour rapidly replaces her in the king's affections, a process speeded up by Henry's near-fatal jousting accident and Anne's hysteria-induced miscarriage.(n)

programme.title: Episode 209
programme.desc: The fall from grace of Anne Boleyn is swift and complete, as the king grants greater powers to the family of his new love Jane Seymour, and accepts Thomas Cromwell's obviously trumped-up charges of adultery against the queen.(n)

programme.title: Episode 210
programme.desc: In the Season 2 finale, Anne awaits execution in the Tower of London as Henry's marriage to her is annulled, baby Elizabeth is removed from the line of succession, and Henry proposes to Jane Seymour, who accepts.(n)

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: This movie chronicles the journey of a group of enslaved Africans who overtake their captor's ship and attempt to return to their beloved homeland. When the ship is seized, the captives are brought to the United States where they are charged with murder and await their fate in prison. A courtroom battle ensues that captures the attention of the entire nation. For the men and woman on trial, it's simply a fight for the basic right of freedom. Directed by Steven Spielberg.(n)

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat.(n)

programme.title: Operation Odessa
programme.desc: This is a true crime documentary featuring a Russian mobster, a Miami playboy and a Cuban spy who sold a Soviet submarine to a Colombian drug cartel for $35 million. A mid-'90s gangster epic that hopscotches from Brooklyn to Miami and Cali to Moscow, the film tells the story of three friends who set out to hustle the Russian mob, the Cali cartel and the DEA for the score of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Lord of War
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this drama thriller as Yuri Orlov, a Russian immigrant who becomes a millionaire in the Eighties and Nineties by reselling weapons from his politically crumbling homeland to "hot spot" regions around the world, all while marrying a beautiful woman (Bridget Moynahan), dodging a determined federal agent (Ethan Hawke), and occasionally facing the immorality of his chosen profession. Jared Leto and Ian Holm costar in this film from writer/director Andrew Niccol ("Gattaca," "The Truman Show").(n)

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.(n)

programme.title: Gangster Land
programme.desc: At the height of 1920s prohibition, notorious gangster Al Capone recruits amateur boxer Machine Gun Jack McGurn to help fight the Irish & protect his empire on the crime-ridden streets of Chicago. When the Italian mob becomes the most lucrative criminal organization in the country, tensions build with "Bugs" Moran of the Irish Northside gang, igniting a brutal gang war.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)

programme.title: Lord of War
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this drama thriller as Yuri Orlov, a Russian immigrant who becomes a millionaire in the Eighties and Nineties by reselling weapons from his politically crumbling homeland to "hot spot" regions around the world, all while marrying a beautiful woman (Bridget Moynahan), dodging a determined federal agent (Ethan Hawke), and occasionally facing the immorality of his chosen profession. Jared Leto and Ian Holm costar in this film from writer/director Andrew Niccol ("Gattaca," "The Truman Show").(n)

programme.title: Robocop
programme.desc: When an honest cop (Peter Weller) is killed in the line of duty, the embattled Detroit Police Department of the future brings him back to life as RoboCop, the latest in cyborg technology. Programmed to be the ultimate law enforcer, RoboCop's not supposed to remember his human past - but memories of life, love and family are flooding in, blurring the line between man and machine, even as RoboCop sweeps the streets of "scum." Nancy Allen, Kurtwood Smith and Ronny Cox costar in this sci-fi blockbuster.(n)

programme.title: Thurman vs. Diaz
programme.desc: Welterweight Keith "One Time" Thurman vs. Julio Diaz. Classic fight.(n)

programme.title: SCB: Thurman vs. Bundu
programme.desc: Keith Thurman versus Leonard Bundu. Classic fight.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: In the midst of a global crisis, the USS Alabama receives an unconfirmed order to launch its nuclear missiles - signaling the start of World War III. The tension quickly rises as the sub's respected commander (Gene Hackman) and his brilliant executive officer (Denzel Washington) clash over the validity of their orders, battling each other for control of the sub. Also starring Viggo Mortensen and James Gandolfini.(n)

programme.title: Erik Griffin: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: In his first ever stand-up comedy special, Erik Griffin breaks it down while talking about himself, society as a whole and everything in between.(n)

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: The first name in news magazines is the last word in sports. Jack Ford profiles the 75th Anniversary of the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships and its role in creating future military leaders. Plus, twenty-five years after "Friday Night Lights" exposed the grit of big time high school football Sharyn Alfonsi revisits some of its true-life characters in Odessa, Texas, and watches this year's team chase a dream. And Mo Rocca goes out on the high seas to report on one of the most lucrative deep sea fishing tournaments in the world.(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the first manned mission to Mars, commanded by Luke Graham (Don Cheadle), lands safely on the red planet, but is soon met with catastrophe. Haunted by a cryptic last message from Graham, NASA launches the Mars Recovery Mission to investigate and bring back survivors. Confronted with nearly insurmountable dangers, but propelled by deep friendship, the team finally lands on Mars and makes a discovery that explains everything.(n)

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: In the midst of a global crisis, the USS Alabama receives an unconfirmed order to launch its nuclear missiles - signaling the start of World War III. The tension quickly rises as the sub's respected commander (Gene Hackman) and his brilliant executive officer (Denzel Washington) clash over the validity of their orders, battling each other for control of the sub. Also starring Viggo Mortensen and James Gandolfini.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: The Whole Nine Yards
programme.desc: Oz (Matthew Perry) is a miserable dentist living with Sophie (Rosanna Arquette), his shrew of a wife. Things get even worse when hitman Jimmy "The Tulip" (Bruce Willis) moves in next door. Sent by Sophie to Chicago to rat out Jimmy to the Gogalak gang, Oz meets and falls in love with Cynthia (Natasha Henstridge), Jimmy's estranged wife. Oz returns home only to discover Sophie's hired Jill (Amanda Peet), his perky dental hygienist, to kill him.(n)

programme.title: Assassination Games
programme.desc: Jack and Derek are the two best assassins in the world. Conway is a master sharpshooter and Chase is equally skilled with a knife. The two rivals must form an uneasy alliance to take down the head of a drug cartel backed by the DEA.(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Isolated and cut off from the city inside a soon-to-be-closed L.A. police station, a group of police officers and convicts join forces to defend themselves against a gang who wants to kill someone trapped inside the precinct.(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: Anthony (Taylor John Smith) is a standout player on his high school's basketball team with everything going for him: a killer three-point shot, a loving girlfriend (Zazie Beetz) and a chance at a scholarship to Cornell. But Anthony's dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his volatile father (Michael Shannon), a hard-drinking writer whose compulsive gambling threatens to derail the lives of both his wife (Carla Gugino) and son. Anthony must summon the strength to step out from his father's shadow and reclaim his future.(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.(n)

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: I'm Still Laughing
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Bill Bellamy hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's comedy franchise. Featuring comedy veteran Bruce Bruce who teams up with Huggy Lowdown, Aida Rodriguez, and Brian "Da Wildcat" Smith.(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Robert De Niro directs this story of a young CIA agent during the Cold War whose dedication to work costs him his innocence and his soul. Academy Award winners Matt Damon and Angelina Jolie also star.(n)

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: The outrageously funny stand up Sebastian Maniscalco stars in this comedy special, blending his high energy physicality and his inimitable facial expressions to send up modern life through the lens of his old-world, Italian-American upbringing.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: The Boondock Saints
